byline.contributor: Conor Dougherty reported from Austin, Tex., and Mike Isaac from New York.
byline.original: By CONOR DOUGHERTY and MIKE ISAAC

abstract: South by Southwest conference devotes daylong meeting to issue of online harassment of women in gaming.
lead_paragraph: At a daylong meeting at the South by Southwest conference, panelists in the gaming industry discussed attacks against them, including death threats.

headline.main: SXSW Addresses Online Harassment of Women in Gaming
headline.print_headline: SXSW Takes a Day to Discuss Online Harassment of Women in Gaming

snippet: At a daylong meeting at the South by Southwest conference, panelists in the gaming industry discussed attacks against them, including death threats.

keywords.value: South by Southwest Music and Media Conference
keywords.name: subject
